definition: refers to various monocotyledonous flowering plants including Acorus calamus and Typha orientalis/common cattail/bullrush

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]

sentences.english: 8. Pick a dandelion that has gone to seed.
sentences.chinese: 摘一个已经结子的蒲公英。

sentences.english: They made necklaces and garlands of them.
sentences.chinese: 他们把蒲公英做成项链和花环。

sentences.english: Just as a child and picked up the dandelion to be fine.
sentences.chinese: 就像儿时，拿起蒲公英的细须。

sentences.english: At that time, an old lady dug in the ground of the field and picked the roots of the dandelions.
sentences.chinese: 这时，有位老妇人在田野上挖地，捡起蒲公英的根。
蒲公英是那样妩媚动人。

sentences.english: Last time I saw dandelions and ladybugs near the pond.
sentences.chinese: 上一次我在池塘附近看到蒲公英和瓢虫。

sentences.english: Or as a dandelion see-pod and be swept away.
sentences.chinese: 或者像结荚的蒲公英被一扫而空。

sentences.english: The violet and the dandelion are dainty spring flowers, which could be seen in early March.
sentences.chinese: 紫罗兰和蒲公英是在三月处可见的娇嫩的春花。

sentences.english: The e-sail would thus catch the solar wind like some huge dandelion seed that is blown aloft by terrestrial breezes.
sentences.chinese: 该电子帆像一些被吹起的蒲公英种子那样搭乘太阳风。

sentences.english: No Clouds and Rains, No Clear Skies by Europa Huang…
sentences.chinese: 也无风雨也无晴黄建为宫哲蒲公英。

sentences.english: Dandelion on blue sky, flying with the wind the sailing ship, paddling away.
sentences.chinese: 蒲公英在蔚蓝的天空下，乘着风之帆船，划向远方。

sentences.english: On the end of every dandelion seed.
sentences.chinese: 在每粒蒲公英种子的末端。

sentences.english: The wind puffed away the seeds of the dandelion.
sentences.chinese: 风吹散了蒲公英的种子。

sentences.english: Very need you, just like the dandelion need the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 很需要珎，就像蒲公英需要微风。

sentences.english: The Taraxacum Officinale contains lots of falavone, and the Taraxacum Ohwianum is worthy to be further studied and be widely used.
sentences.chinese: 东北蒲公英具有进一步研究和开发利用的价值。

sentences.english: First, you pick the dandelions, take out all the roots and keep the leaves.
sentences.chinese: 首先，自己出去摘蒲公英，把根全部去掉，只留叶子。

definition: dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
